mapper.select: select t_task.*, t_company.id as companyid, t_team.`name` teamname, t_company.`name` as companyname from t_task LEFT JOIN t_team ON t_task.teamid = t_team.id LEFT JOIN t_company ON t_team.companyid = t_company.id WHERE t_task.teamid= #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_task.`month`= #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t_task.`month`, t_company.id as companyid, sum(t_task.profit) as profit, sum(t_task.tourists) as tourists, sum(t_task.actualprofit) as actualprofit, sum(t_task.actualtourists) as actualtourists, avg(t_task.actualscore) as actualscore, sum(t_task.othercost) as othercost, t_company.`name` as companyname from t_task LEFT JOIN t_team ON t_task.teamid = t_team.id LEFT JOIN t_company ON t_team.companyid = t_company.id where t_company.id = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_task.`month`= #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY t_company.id

select t_company.id as companyid, sum(t_task.profit) as profit, sum(t_task.tourists) as tourists, sum(t_task.actualprofit) as actualprofit, sum(t_task.actualtourists) as actualtourists, avg(t_task.actualscore) as actualscore, sum(t_task.othercost) as othercost, t_task.`month`, t_company.`name` as companyname from t_task LEFT JOIN t_team ON t_task.teamid = t_team.id LEFT JOIN t_company ON t_team.companyid = t_company.id where t_company.id = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY `month` ORDER BY t_task.`month` desc limit 12
